p: Further, Flavonoids and cardiac glycosides showed a Post Antibiotic Effect (PAE) of 2–4 h and 2–6 h, respectively (Fig. A3 in Additional file 5). Flavonoids were equally effective (4 h) against Salmonella Typhimurium 2 and Klebsiella pneumoniae 2, whereas cardiac glycosides had a maximum effect against Candida albicans (6 h). The ethyl acetate extract also showed a similar PAE of 2–6 h. Among all the test preparations (ethyl acetate extract, flavonoids and cardiac glycosides), the longest effectivity was observed against Candida albicans (4–6 h), whereas for organisms like Staphylococcus aureus, Salmonella Typhimurium 2 and Klebsiella pneumoniae 2, their effect lasted for 2–4 h (Fig. A3 in Additional file 5).
